New Category

Add Task

Due Date:

Priority:

Category:

Help

Features:

  • The Today category will display tasks due today
  • The Upcoming category will display tasks due within 3 days
  • The Anytime category will display tasks without a due date
  • The Completed category will display completed tasks

Deleting Categories:

Note that deleting a category will move all tasks in that category to the Inbox category.

Inbox
